rules_text:
First strike, haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, sacrifice a Memory.
Whenever this creature attacks, cache the top card of your library face-down. [i](Look at it, then exile it face down. Create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this Memory: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
